original_title: DOTGA: Da One That Ghost Away
overview: Wanting to save the house of her beloved grandmother from being sequestered, paranormal expert  Carmel Monseratt and her “bebest” best friend Jerald “Jeje” Zee-Yan have decided to form a squad of ghost busters with their misfits buddies in order to meet both ends.
title: DOTGA: Da One That Ghost Away
